subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion stunned Liverpool with a 2-0 win at Anfield, soaking up 80 minutes of pressure before scoring two late goals for its first Premier League victory since December.
snippet: West Bromwich Albion stunned Liverpool with a 2-0 win at Anfield, soaking up 80 minutes of pressure before scoring two late goals for its first Premier League victory since December.
